#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{

long long t, n , x, pr ,count,i,maxcount;
scanf("%lld",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%lld",&n);
scanf("%lld",&pr);
for(i=0,count=0,maxcount=0;i<n-1;i++)
{
scanf("%lld",&x);
if(x==pr)
count++;
else
count=0;
if(count>maxcount)
maxcount=count;
pr=x;
}
printf("%lld\n",maxcount);


}








}
